website_summaries.verdict: Industrial-strength. Compact enough for home use, yet wide enough to clean large wood floors quickly. Comfortable to hold.
pros: Large mop head, yet reaches easily into corners and under furniture
cons: Reports of the reusable dust cloth falling apart when washing
Head does not swivel very far

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed! i have a large home with a lot of wood and tile floors. I can't even imagine how long it would take me with a regular old broom. This guy is my best friend and does the job in minutes!! I run it over my floors once a day, make a pile, and then use a Dustbuster to pick up the pile. Shake out the broom, and its good to go! I've now washed the head in my washing machine (and then dried it in the drier too) probably 5 or 6 times as needed, just when its gotten a little grey. Its held up well. Would definitely purchase again and recommend!
customer_reviews.author: MissRad

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Now I know why people who clean floors for a living use this type of mop. I've had mine only a day. I cleaned all the wooden and tile floors in my largish house in about 30 minutes - and cleaned them perfectly. It is very solid and well made - clearly professional grade. It will pay for itself through all the Swiffer and Bona products I won't need to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Max Davies

customer_reviews.title: This Floor Mop Is Defective
customer_reviews.text: I read the great reviews but the floor mop I received does not work properly. The handle does not stay locked into position. The mop goes in the opposite direction or no direction. There is no way to control it when mopping into a corner and out. It does not swivel around. It will not turn. It only goes back and forth and the dirt gets left on the floor. This review is late. I bought the product about a year ago and it got packed away. Waste of money. Going in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara E

customer_reviews.title: Great with unusual results
customer_reviews.text: This is very solidly made but the handle is hollow. It catches all dirt, is easily moveable in various directions. However in our home it is our kittens favorite riding toy. As soon as we start to sweep, its all hands on deck for a great ride! The bottom is easily removed for washing and so far has held up to washing well. I do wish I'd gotten a smaller one, simply because with all the cats/kittens on top its a bit weight to push.
customer_reviews.author: Eames

customer_reviews.title: GREAT QUALITY+++HANDLE TOO WIDE
customer_reviews.text: This is a 5 star industrial strength product for everything but the handle too wide to maneuver with one hand around turns. straight is fine but purchased this for home and many turns. I am average women height 5'6". and my hands way too small to turn with one hand. Need to use 2 hands to turn. believe hands of 6'4' male would be fine. Wish this had narrower handle as this one is the best quality I have found. To zip around the house and clean real quick makes it difficult do to with this wide handle. But thanks to the super wide handle it is no longer my job but rather my husbands.
customer_reviews.author: NG

customer_reviews.title: Buy it only if you like kids sized mops!
customer_reviews.text: The mop part is good, but the handle & function are poor. The handle is supposed to telescope, but it doesn’t, even if you follow the directions to the letter. Neither of the two men I had try it had any success. I’m 4’7’’ & it’s too short for me. It has a mechanism to let the mop spin or stay straight, but it spins regardless of the mechanism. There is no response from the seller of course. So there you have it folks, a 24” kid’s spinning mop!
customer_reviews.author: Sjoukje #2

customer_reviews.title: Got Wood?
customer_reviews.text: If you have wood, tile or travertine in your home this is the product for you. Fast, easy with no moving parts, you’ll be finished before you could drag you vacuum out of the closet to do the same job. There is a reason professional cleaners and janitorial services us this product.....it works very well and saves time.
customer_reviews.author: G. W. Meador

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Great broom! It is exactly what I was looking for. Very well made and does the job effortlessly. I read some comments saying it doesnt swivel and to my surprise it does. It could be that they did not clip the handle to the actual broom correctly. it doesnt swivel 360 degrees but enough left and right to sweep without and issue.
customer_reviews.author: Luedtke

customer_reviews.title: Nice mop.  Cheap handle.
customer_reviews.text: Mop works fine ... a little too big and wide for the house, so now it's used on the garage floor. Wish the head could pivot more, but not a huge deal. Cheap material used for the handle ... it broke in half, probably a result of shaking the mop to release dust and debris. Wish the handle were manufactured with thicker material for strength/longevity.
customer_reviews.author: Foster Landberry

customer_reviews.title: Finally, I found a good dust mop.
customer_reviews.text: I finally found a dust mop that really picks up the dirt and I can actually shake it. I had one like this for years that finally wore out. I have tried for at lest 2 years to replace it, I bought expensive mops and cheaper ones. Not one of them came close to my old mop. When I saw this on amazon I knew it was what I wanted. It is just what I wanted. It is a little heavier than my old one, but I have gotten use to that. So glad I found this.
customer_reviews.author: DEH

customer_reviews.title: This mop is great to use in my shop.
customer_reviews.text: For years I have used a standard bristle brrom to clean the floors in my shop. The problem is that bristle broom does not get everything and kicks up a lot of dust. This dust mop does a great of catching dirt, trash, metal chips, etc. I can also easily get under things like tables, which can not be done with a bristle broom.
customer_reviews.author: nomad123

customer_reviews.title: Won’t swivel. Retuned it
customer_reviews.text: Won’t swivel. I got this for my new construction cleaning company and had to return it. Didn’t work for me at all.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle McAninch

customer_reviews.title: Good product,
customer_reviews.text: This is a good mop! It makes cleaning a breeze. I have cats and there is always hair all over the place. I have used it for about and week and it works very well to pickup the cat hair and dust. It is pretty large and the handle is very long so may not work for everyone. Great product, though.
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. My house has all hardwood and laminate floors. So cleaning is a breeze. It's wide enough to make it quick to sweep a room, but narrow enough to maneuver around a regular room. When I'm done sweeping, I tap it on the floor a few times and vacuum up the dust with a hand held vacuum (which rhymes with Tyson). The sweeping part comes off easily so it can be cleaned in a washing machine.
customer_reviews.author: Charmello

customer_reviews.title: Love having a dust mop
customer_reviews.text: I love having a dust mop. It's great for dust, small / lightweight particles and pet hair. Not so great for cat litter on tile....still need a standard broom for that. The handle gets stuck from time to time and needs to be unattached / reattached to work again. I ordered two other dust mop heads to try. (The others were microfiber blend and the nylon yarn.) This one is OK. It didn't seem to pick up as much as the microfiber blend which was my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Reese C.

customer_reviews.title: Design and manufacturing flaws
customer_reviews.text: Good mop until the spring slips out from under the clamp--good luck getting it back under so the clamp will work to secure the mop head to the handle. Fortunately (?) my mop had a manufacturing defect (insufficient flattening of end of spring retaining rod) that allowed me to slip the clamp halfway off, and using a screwdriver and pliers, put the spring back into position. Very disappointing design and manufacture for something this expensive.
customer_reviews.author: mc6538

customer_reviews.title: quality product
customer_reviews.text: This dust mop saves me so much time! I like that the handle is adjustable so my tall husband can use it with ease and I can shorten it for my use. I have a difficult time shaking it out since it is large and heavy duty. Happy with this purchase. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for large surfaces
customer_reviews.text: I wish I’d purchased this sooner. I have hard surfaces in every room and get tired of vacuuming or dusting with those tiny Swiffer cloths. This moves easily around furniture, holds the dust, and shortens my cleaning time. I can dust main floors more often because it takes less time to cover the surface.
customer_reviews.author: SP

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality. Solid and well-made
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. Solid and well-made. I just installed wood floors and this picks up all of the dust! This product is probably one of the best quality items i've purchase on Amazon in a while.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Strudy and made of metal
customer_reviews.text: This product is GREAT. It is made of metal and very sturdy. I gave it 4 stars cause of the dust mop is not a tight strings. Also, I am a dummy!! The handle extends and I couldn't get it to stay to the size I needed. So, dummy me thought it was broke. HA HA HA , Not, leave it to a left handed person to turn it the wrong way and expect it to work. But, this is worth the money!!
customer_reviews.author: Vicker H

customer_reviews.title: Great for Large Uncarpeted Floors
customer_reviews.text: Do you have a lot of hardwood or ceramic floor? This dust mop is for you. Easy to clean and maneuver, great for cleaning under beds and hallways. Kicking myself for not buying something like this long ago.
customer_reviews.author: CR

customer_reviews.title: This is the best dusting mop!
customer_reviews.text: This has been the best dusting mop!! I get my house done in a jiffy and I am not kidding. The dusting head picks up everything. I live next to a high traffic road and I was having to sweep 2 or 3 times a day when my grandkids are running in and out of the house. Since I bought this my dusting chore is so easy. I just bought another one for my vacation home!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I changed my review to 4 stars instead of 2. It didn't swivel at first, but another reviewer told me to slide the white plastic piece upward (on the part that attaches to the mop head) and it worked. Good quality mop.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. Works great
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Works great. My maid recommended it for in between cleans and we live it. We have a tons of tile and brick floors. Way faster than a broom, however you still have to get something to pick up the pile it makes, the mop doesn't hold the debri.
customer_reviews.author: Turk

customer_reviews.title: Terrific dry mop set!!
customer_reviews.text: This mop does a terrific job and I love that I could buy extra mop heads AND that they are washable!! WONDERFUL!!
customer_reviews.author: A Little ol' gal from "Jaw-Ja"

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful! Sturdy! Adjustable!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great dust mop! It is really sturdy with a wide handle that’s comfortable on my hands. I love that the handle is adjustable because I’m very tall and with other mops I have to bend over, which hurts my back. I also like the 18” width. The frame for the removable mop head is also sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just plain easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for an 84 year old with hard wood flooring she was very happy except for not having this product before now 😉
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A bit surprised
customer_reviews.text: I loved the mop. Received yesterday. Worked great. Washed and the fibers matted and fell apart. Just wondering if i did something wrong? It still isn’t dry today? I don’t want to leave a bad review just need help. I threw my packaging all out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quick and efficient
customer_reviews.text: This was easy and quick to use and effective! Picked up all the fine dust we get in our area.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Batt

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended for great quality.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy dust mop handle. Old school "janitor" quality for in-home use. Paired with the dust mop you have all you need.
customer_reviews.author: Clint

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Great dust mop...probably made for industrial uses but fits the bill for a house with all hardwood floors and two shedding dogs. The mop head pivots, enabling you to get into all crevices and corners. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: TNMan38

customer_reviews.title: Great for hard wood floors!
customer_reviews.text: I just got hard wood flooring throughout the house and with four dogs the pet hair can get out of control very quickly! I love the ease of this dust mop and that it is washable! I would definitely recommend this product to a anyone!
customer_reviews.author: resjones

customer_reviews.title: So much better than a broom.
customer_reviews.text: I work freight decided I needed a dust mop for my apartment. This is extremely close to industrial quality. The ONLY difference is the handle is adjustable and made of metal instead of fake wood. Honestly the adjustable handle is nicer than the fake wood. 24” is perfect for an apartment or area that you want to sweep in-between furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Sami Kat

customer_reviews.title: Quality mop
customer_reviews.text: This mop is amazing. My fiancé encouraged me to buy it for our new, and first ever, house. He was a PPD worker at his school for a semester and a summer, and he told me that this is the type of mop that they used. We just took it out of its box, and he's using it right now! The owner, Kurt, wrote a very sweet note, which inspired me to write my first ever review on Amazon. It's a quality item. You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: AGT

customer_reviews.title: It's excellent for hard floors
customer_reviews.text: Reminds me of my grandmothers large mop when I was a kid! which is exactly what I was looking for! It's excellent for hard floors. Much wider than expected since I couldn't find a width measurement on the product details. But so far so good! Very happy! Exactly what I was looking for!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product and seller
customer_reviews.text: Great seller. I put this mop in the wash and had some shedding and sent the pictures to the seller listing my concerns and the seller provided a free replacement washable mop. This dust mop makes our life so much easier when it comes to cleaning the floors it is a breeze a great product great seller would not hesitate to buy another product from the seller again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the Ajustable Handle.
customer_reviews.text: I studied quite sometime before I purchased this dust mop. I am very happy with it. One of the big things I like is that I can adjust the handle to fit me. All other handles are about 60" long and that is to much length for as I am 60" tall. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Betty C. Gardner

customer_reviews.title: The attachment part is a bit flimsy but it does ...
customer_reviews.text: The attachment part is a bit flimsy but it does the job. I bought it for my home so it doesn't take as much abuse as if it was in a commercial setting.
customer_reviews.author: Kevia

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Received the mop today and put it work. Very easy to assemble. It's a dream to use on my hardwood floors. I was through with the floors in a short time because of the width of the mop. It did such a great job. I am really impressed. Don't think i will ever go back to using regular mops.
customer_reviews.author: C. Dawkins

customer_reviews.title: Feels solid
customer_reviews.text: Much stronger than my old one, looks and feels solid
customer_reviews.author: terry

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this big fust mop got my house. Makes cleaning fast and easy.
customer_reviews.author: Pwitty

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just have problems keeping the handle locked at right length, keeps coming un-locked.
customer_reviews.author: sandy rathbun

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. Works great on Hardwood floors.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis M.

customer_reviews.title: I enjoy cleaning my floors now and they look terrific
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe it took me so long to order this dust mop! I have been living in my new home, which is 90% dark hardwood floors, and have tried everything to keep it clean. This mop does the job. I enjoy cleaning my floors now and they look terrific!
customer_reviews.author: becca

customer_reviews.title: Works great, seems durable
customer_reviews.text: I pick up a lot of dog hair, I mean A LOT. Works great, seems durable. Only thing I would change is the mop head. Some of the strings have fallen off, but otherwise great.
customer_reviews.author: Christina V

customer_reviews.title: Ragtime
customer_reviews.text: Its working great! Our entire downstairs of a 3800 sq ft house is tile. A little duster spray on this, and my son knocks out the whole place in about 10 mins. Works real well.
customer_reviews.author: FedLeo

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. so much better than a vacuum on wood floors. I have 2 huskies and use this to get the hair up everyday.
customer_reviews.author: SpicyPepe

customer_reviews.title: Great product. We have walnut wood floos through most ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. We have walnut wood floos through most of house and shows all of the dust. This saves lots of time and sweeps up most of the dust.
customer_reviews.author: J. Richardson

customer_reviews.title: I love this mop and feel like a school janitor when ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this mop and feel like a school janitor when I'm using it. It is very easy to maneuver and I'm very pleased with the results. It really picks up the dust and makes my polished concrete floors shine.
customer_reviews.author: Pauline

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Very pleased. Now it takes about 5 minutes to dust the floor, and it easily goes under the furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made and durable month after month!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought 3 sets total. 1 for both my houses and 1 for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: It’s a lifesaver.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a godsend for my word floors in my house. Every family with hardwood and pets needs thus!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... home is all hardwood floors and this mop is great for that
customer_reviews.text: Our home is all hardwood floors and this mop is great for that. It makes sweeping at the end of the day a breeze. It is quite sturdy and not at all chintzy.
customer_reviews.author: Herbie

customer_reviews.title: Dog owner loves
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 dogs in the house. This works awesome on my floors. Quick and easy
customer_reviews.author: Deanna M

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: super long handle easy to reach under bed and furniture
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Duncan

customer_reviews.title: This thing is great, superb dust and fur pickup on my hardwood ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great, superb dust and fur pickup on my hardwood floors. Now if only they made one with extended edges on the sides for baseboards!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: As a disabled person I found this to be a great, easy to use to clean wood floors, highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: PnE Spinks

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great size for a house with a lot of tile.
customer_reviews.author: D. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Amazing company. Handwritten note in my order
customer_reviews.text: Amazing company. Handwritten note in my order! Works wonders on my porches. We are in the middle of grass seed farms so we get super dusty in late summer. This has been a life (and time) saver.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great dust mop
customer_reviews.text: Works very well around the house to quickly remove dust and debris from our hardwood floor. Was easy to assemble and has a telescoping handle to adjust for your height.
customer_reviews.author: danny

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great! It had a hard time in the washer but I was able to fix it.
customer_reviews.author: TAG

customer_reviews.title: Treat yourself by saving time!
customer_reviews.text: High quality. Worth every penny. Actually, saves money over time since it cuts sweeping time to a fraction compared to a regular broom.
customer_reviews.author: Shane F.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice floor mop with a good quality handle. I expect it to last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Hiding the good stuff in the custodial realm.
customer_reviews.text: Need these in stores not just custodial use. Beats a OCedar at the Shop-mart any day!
customer_reviews.author: p

customer_reviews.title: Works great on laminate
customer_reviews.text: Works great on laminate. We have a long haired cat who is shedding for the summer, this mop makes quick work of hair clumps and dust bunnies. Everything it picks up is easily dislodged by a few shakes.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good item, received it quickly, works great for my concrete floor.
customer_reviews.author: Debby Mikulin

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this!!!! It's perfect for my hardwood floors and pet hair. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made product!
customer_reviews.text: We were delighted to receive this well made product. What a step up from regular store bought sweepers.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda T.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, cheap, cheap and small. Not sure ...
customer_reviews.text: Cheap, cheap, cheap and small. Not sure how this is "industrial" version. Very flimsy mop portion, some of it had already fallen out in delivery box. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great size!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. It did what it was supposed to do. Because of the size, it takes very little time to sweep my hardwoods. <3
customer_reviews.author: Tamika CM

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and well made
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and well made. I use it on my residential hardwood floors to keep them free of dog fur and whatever else gets tracked in.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn S.

customer_reviews.title: Ms
customer_reviews.text: The handle sticks every once in awhile and to be adjusted.
customer_reviews.author: jana aragon

customer_reviews.title: Great Mop
customer_reviews.text: Great mop. Just wish somehow it could pick up the crumbs on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Stein

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic dust mop.
customer_reviews.text: What a great tool. It swivels and has a large mop head. Makes light work. Sturdy and well made.
customer_reviews.author: kdw

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: does a great job at picking up dust and dirt!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah Rossland

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really like this dust mop. It is exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.author: liz feiock

customer_reviews.title: but it does an excellent job of getting all the dust and loose dirt ...
customer_reviews.text: It was bigger than I expected, but it does an excellent job of getting all the dust and loose dirt off the wood floors. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: pam bulthuis

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Handle doesn't swivel like other brands Ive had, other then that not bad.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Leinen

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good product but just a little too big :-)
customer_reviews.author: Mei

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: This arrived quickly and is actually a very robust design. I'm an engineer and I build stuff...this item is impressive. A great value. The handle and attachment are strong, function perfectly, and will take abuse...if you like to abuse mops. Handle length adjustment is very handy in tight spaces. The swivel action is just as it should be. The head is an industrial cotton head that only needs a shot of dusting oil (like all dust mops). Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: MachoBunny

customer_reviews.title: Nine Forty Industrial dust mop
customer_reviews.text: I love my large dust mop. I can get twice as much done in half the time.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: It does an excellent job! The mop is sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this dust mop to help clean my hardwood floors in my home. It does an excellent job! The mop is sturdy, the head is the right size, and it's easy to maneuver. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: Work great. 24" is a good size for the home
customer_reviews.text: Work great. 24" is a good size for the home. I can sweep the whole house in minutes
customer_reviews.author: Mike W Rettler

customer_reviews.title: would recommend to a friend
customer_reviews.text: Works well use in my garage, would recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Eld. J. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Love it! If you have dogs that shed and ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! If you have dogs that shed and hard wood floors this is what you have been waiting for! So much easier than sweeping with a broom.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and does the job. I highly recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: cindy lou

customer_reviews.title: I love the dust mop but not the mop head so ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the dust mop but not the mop head so much,it keeps shedding all over the place even before first use it was shedding as soon as I removed the plastic cellophane from the mop head the material started falling all over my floor,not sure how long it will last is my worry :(
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: I was really disappointed in the quality of this
customer_reviews.text: I was really disappointed in the quality of this. After using is for several weeks, it needed washed. I read the comments that it washed up well. It did not!! It fell apart in my washing machine and I washed it on gentle cycle!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I feel I pick up better than 45
customer_reviews.text: just right length for me. I feel I pick up better than 45 inch
customer_reviews.author: Christine T

customer_reviews.title: sent back
customer_reviews.text: 4 stars if you live in a warehouse! Not for home use!
customer_reviews.author: Krouge22

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great item included a personal note of thanks!! First class......
customer_reviews.author: Lee Lemon

customer_reviews.title: Great For Walls and Ceiling
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome. I love the size of it. It is not like the smaller ones from the store. This is huge. The handle is adjustable; telescopic. I have used it to dust my walls and up near the ceiling for cob webs. I have used it on my tile and laminate floors and it picks up stuff like a magnet. The duster head is heavy duty; the stitching is sturdy. It is easy to put on and remove. And it washes up great. I came out of the dryer looking new.
customer_reviews.author: Pandalana W.

customer_reviews.title: DONT DO IT
customer_reviews.text: Worst dust mop I have ever used. Swivel doesn't work very well. Doesn't fit under the couch because it won't lay down. Thought maybe it was just me but my husband and father both said it just sucks. After one wash, not only did it shed like crazy (so make sure you wash alone) but it started leaving dirt/dust/small bits of trash behind. I had to go back with a broom. No janitor would ever use this, so I am not sure what makes it industrial strength. I wish I would have spent more to get a better dust mop because this thing if going into the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I was looking for and does an excellent job on my tile floors. We have a large dog who sheds a great deal. I was tired of spending money on dust mops that I used once and threw away. I didn't want microfiber and I wanted something made in the USA. This is a sturdy cotton dust mop that is washable and is made in America! The handle is adjustable and works just as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca & Jodi

customer_reviews.title: Great Dust Mop
customer_reviews.text: We live in a dusty environment. This dust mop works very well in our house. After we run it over the floor, we just give it a good shake outside. We like the 18 inch size, it cleans plenty fast. For our house, the 24 inch would be too big. The handle is just perfect, swiveling low to the floor so we can dust all the way under our couch and chairs. The extendable handle is also great; someone else mentioned that it doesn’t lock in an extended position, but all you do is turn it until it tightens, and it stays extended to whatever length you want. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Colonel Scrimshaw Vinegar

customer_reviews.title: This is a well made, US made cleaning TOOL.
customer_reviews.text: The handle is excellent with a large diameter main tube and large grips but it's light weight. The frame appears to be powder coated steel and should last a lifetime in residential service. The mop head is like a string mop. As expected, it does a good job on hard surfaces. The 18" size is NOT inclusive of the strings so it's somewhat larger than 18" on the floor. This is a serviceable tool for cleaning; it's not $20 worth of Chinese made,synthetic junk with a plastic handle and plastic fittings. It's light enough to be easy to use and heavy duty enough to last a long, long time.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Look no further, BUY THIS ONE!
customer_reviews.text: I have usd many dry mops through the years. This one by far exceeds my expectations! It’s very sturdy and well made and easy to use! The adjustable handle is nice because I clean houses for a living so I’m constantly loading this in and out of the car. I can shrink the handle by a simple twist and bring it back up when I need to! It’s nice too because I can also use a clean mop head and extend the pole to wipe down walls. I do this to help remove appt from wood stove usage when the dust settles on the walls. Great product! I would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa A. LaBelle

customer_reviews.title: BEST QUALITY EVER
customer_reviews.text: This is the MOST WELL MADE DUST MOP EVER. After breaking my Plastic Bona ($$$), any dust mop with plastic connections were permanently removed from my lifetime. This connection clip is so strong I attached my Bona to it and it works great. Also you can attach towels to it for giant spills, and micro dust towels. Very maneuverable!!! This is the best piece of America ingenuity I’ve seen for a long while. Wash the mop in A LAUNDRY BAG. (I do not receive anything for my reviews, on top of this, I don’t lie - -try that for day).
customer_reviews.author: Sandy S

customer_reviews.title: THIS  DUST MOP IS AMAZING******************
customer_reviews.text: I remember years ago my mom has a cotton dust mop and it worked great on dog hair. This is that mop on steroids, I ordered the 36" mop and I can get the floors done in about 5 minutes. This is not some flimmsy mop, it will hold up for years to come. I really like the way the dog hair comes off when I shake it outside, no need to wash it every time its used. Best part made in AMERICA
customer_reviews.author: MaryEllen

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my apartment/condo
customer_reviews.text: I couldnt have ask for a better product. I bought this for my apartment/condo that is fully laminated floors. When i say this thing picks up everything..man. it swivels to get under tables, chairs, the couch. Easy to throw in the wash. Lightweight and long handle. The dust mops in the stores do not compare. I havnt used my broom since i bought this dust mop. U wont be disappointed. I will be ording another for my friend. Let me knw if this was helpful to u
customer_reviews.author: LynnRedd
